text: 9.17 Kis 9.16, Gal 3.8, 3.22 Pen buk Baybol mɨgan ayaŋ, God ne man Yijip adaŋ bɨnonɨm olap nop, takaw olap agak. Anɨb agak, Gos yad anɨgɨl mɨdeb, yad nep gɨ tɨmel yɨbɨl gek, kɨles awl yad ak mɨseŋ lɨnɨgab agak. Mɨseŋ lek nɨŋɨd, binɨb okok kɨli man okok mɨdupsek agñɨnɨgabal, God yɨb awl yɨbɨl mɨdeb agñɨnɨgabal agak. Anɨb ak tek yad nep Yijip bɨnonɨm ak aglebin agak.
